```{r}
#read the csv
Zooplankton_wet<-read.csv("Data/Zooplankton data.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  filter(scientific_name_modifiers == "Zooplankton wet weight -[ ]-") %>% #filtered by scientific_name_modifiers
  select("latitude", "longitde", "value_per_area", "units_1")

Zooplankton_wet
```
